section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Local telephone classified advertising directory" means a telephone directory that:
Contains classified advertisements; and
Is distributed free of charge to residents in the State.
"Local telephone classified advertising directory" includes a directory distributed by a person other than a telephone company.

"Local telephone directory" means a telephone directory that is:
Available free of charge to telephone subscribers in an area of the State; and
Does not contain classified advertisements.
"Local telephone directory" includes a directory distributed by a person other than a telephone company.
"Location" means any part of the address of a person, including the street, the city, or the state.
This section applies only to business telephone listings and advertisements.

This section does not apply to any bank, trust company, savings bank, savings and loan association, or credit union incorporated or chartered under the laws of this State or the United States or any other state bank having a branch in this State.

A person is in violation of § 11-703 of this subtitle if the person:
Causes to be published in a local telephone classified advertising directory an advertisement that misrepresents the location of the person; or
Causes to be listed in a local telephone directory a telephone listing that misrepresents the location of the person.

For purposes of this subsection, a person commits a separate violation for each edition of a local telephone directory or local telephone advertising directory in which the advertisement or telephone listing is published.
